bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: a) identical with feng yang 風癢 , wind itching. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry bai hua she 白 花蛇：主治…浮風癮疹 , “It cures … floating wind and dormant papules”.

b) Feeling of nausea brought forth by wind evil that has settled in the stomach. Kai bao xin xiang ding ben cao 開 寶 新 詳 定 本 草 Kai bao chong ding ben cao 開寶重定本草 Substance Entry cheng zi pi 橙子皮：食之去胃中浮風 , “Eating this removes floating wind from the stomach”.
